basics.name: Yangyue Song
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I am an avid yoga teacher and a persistent, problem-solving full-stack engineer who enjoys handling the database, programming logic, and user interface and putting it together in a cohesive product.
As someone who has nurtured a lifelong passion for technology, I am thrilled at the opportunity to apply for a software engineering position. My life is a never-ending journey of learning. Whether it’s with people, software, or yoga – there are always more things to learn and improve.
 In recent years, I have focused on building my skills in Python and JavaScript, and have gained experience with full-stack development using frameworks like Django, React, and Node. I am a dedicated learner who is always eager to expand my knowledge and capabilities.

education.institution: Hack Reactor, San Francisco, CA, USA
education.area: Software Engineering with JavaScript and Python

education.institution: Changchun University of Science and Technology, Changchun, Jilin, China

work.summary: Be responsible for overseeing the staff's performance and duties, marketing the business and designing online web services
highlights: Started a yoga studio and grew membership from 0 to 200+ in the first year of operations

Designed yoga teachers' certificate curriculum and teaching manual. Curated workshops, which
         helped professional yoga teachers achieve their 200HR RYT certifications
Operated the company's official website and social media. Wrote high-quality yoga articles
